Photos.Controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Photos.Controller.Controller
      • Photos.Controller.AdminController

  • public class AdminController
extends Controller
    Defines the functions of the admin subsystem, with this controller and admin.fxml. Handles adding new users and deleting new users. The admin user can never be deleted. The stock user can be deleted, but will appear again on restart.
    Author:
    Krysti Leong, April Dizon
